title: Equality Act 1998 (No. 21 of 1998) and the Disability, Equality, Human Rights,
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Equality Act 1998
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Equality Act 1998 
(Section 20A) (Gender Pay Gap Information) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 31 May 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited employment equality act 1998 (section 20a) (gender pay gap information) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 31 may 2025

title: Equality Act 1998 (No. 21 of 1998) and the Disability, Equality, Human Rights,
heading: 2. The Employment Equality Act 1998 (Section 20A) (Gender Pay Gap
text_raw:
2. The Employment Equality Act 1998 (Section 20A) (Gender Pay Gap 

Information) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 264 of 2022) are amended - 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 2, in the definition of “relevant employer”, by the 
substitution of “50” for “150”, and 

in Regulation 6(1), by the substitution of “5 months” for “6 
months”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 May, 2025. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Children, Equality and Disability. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th May, 2025.
